active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs between security (shorter timeouts) and user experience (longer timeouts) in a banking web app. Propose optimal idle (e.g., 15 minutes) and absolute (e.g., 8 hours) timeout values based on OWASP and NIST guidelines, justifying with real-world risks like session hijacking.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education on 'Timeout Handling' (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 008_Application Security > Web 008_Application Security > 008_Error Handling and Logging > Exceptional Condition Handling > Timeout Handling). Generate 50 high-quality flashcards optimized for Anki/Spaced Repetition, integrating university pedagogy (Bloom's Taxonomy progression), active learning, 4-layer scaffolding, and voter consensus (completeness, pedagogy, scaffolding). **Incorporate these exactly:** - Learning Objectives: [paste the learning_objectives array above] - Active Learning: Weave in prompts as 'Apply to scenario' cards. - Scaffolding: Distribute cards: 25% Layer 1, 25% Layer 2, 25% Layer 3, 25% Layer 4. - Prior knowledge links: Session mgmt/auth. - Sources: OWASP WSTG-SESS-07 (https://owasp.org/www-project-web-security-testing-guide/stable/4-Web_Application_Security_Testing/06-Session_Management_Testing/07-Testing_Session_Timeout), NIST 800-63B/C (https://pages.nist.gov/800-63-3/). - Formative assessments: 20 MCQs w/ distractors, 10 short answer, 10 scenarios, 10 reflections. **Output Format (JSON array of flashcards):** [ { "type": "MCQ|Q&A|Cloze|Scenario|Reflection", "bloom_level": "REMEMBER|etc.", "scaffold_layer": "1|2|3|4", "front": "Question text", "back": { "answer": "Correct response", "explanation": "Why + risk + source", "key_takeaway": "1-sentence summary" }, "options": ["A","B","C","D"] // For MCQ only } ] Ensure variety, misconceptions in distractors, code snippets where applicable, measurable progression. No duplicates.
